Approximate an annulus region by polygon.

Parameters:
annulusAnnulus object to be approximated.
innerNodesCountNumber of polygon nodes to approximate the inner circle of the annulus.
outerNodesCountNumber of polygon nodes to approximate the outer circle of the annulus.
